name: VEGA
intro: NFT collection project with thousands of future idols
introduce: Vega is an NFT collection project with thousands of future idols. Vega is committed to bringing out more talented young people and and turn them into idols. Vega provides a more equitable, valuable and decentralized platform to help these young talents get a fairer chance to show themselves At the same time, fans can directly access to their beloved talents and help them grow careers.
